iso_code.description: The International Organization for Standardization (ISO) 3166-1 alpha-3 country codes.

continent.description: The continent where the country is located.

value_dict.Asia: The location is in the continent of Asia
value_dict.Europe: The location is in the continent of Europe
value_dict.Africa: The location is in the continent of Africa
value_dict.North America: The location is in the continent of North America
value_dict.South America: The location is in the continent of South America
value_dict.Oceania: The location is in the continent of Oceania

total_tests.description: The total number of COVID-19 tests conducted.

new_tests.description: The number of new COVID-19 tests conducted on the date.

total_tests_per_thousand.description: The total number of COVID-19 tests conducted per thousand people.

new_tests_per_thousand.description: The number of new COVID-19 tests conducted on the date per thousand people.

new_tests_smoothed.description: The smoothed number of new COVID-19 tests conducted.

new_tests_smoothed_per_thousand.description: The smoothed number of new COVID-19 tests conducted per thousand people.

positive_rate.description: The rate of positive COVID-19 cases.

tests_per_case.description: The number of tests conducted per confirmed COVID-19 case.

tests_units.description: Units used to report the COVID-19 testing data.

value_dict.tests performed: The testing data is reported as the number of tests performed
value_dict.units unclear: The units of the testing data are unclear
value_dict.samples tested: The testing data is reported as the number of samples tested
value_dict.people tested: The testing data is reported as the number of people tested

total_vaccinations.description: The total number of COVID-19 vaccination doses administered.

people_vaccinated.description: The total number of people who received at least one vaccine dose.

people_fully_vaccinated.description: The total number of people who received all doses prescribed by the vaccination protocol.

total_boosters.description: The total number of booster doses administered.

new_vaccinations.description: The number of new COVID-19 vaccination doses administered on the date.

new_vaccinations_smoothed.description: The smoothed number of new COVID-19 vaccination doses administered.

total_vaccinations_per_hundred.description: The total number of COVID-19 vaccination doses administered per hundred people.

people_vaccinated_per_hundred.description: The total number of people who received at least one vaccine dose per hundred people.

people_fully_vaccinated_per_hundred.description: The total number of people who received all doses prescribed by the vaccination protocol per hundred people.

total_boosters_per_hundred.description: The total number of booster doses administered per hundred people.

new_vaccinations_smoothed_per_million.description: The smoothed number of new COVID-19 vaccination doses administered per million people.

new_people_vaccinated_smoothed.description: The smoothed number of new people who received at least one vaccine dose.

new_people_vaccinated_smoothed_per_hundr.description: The smoothed number of new people who received at least one vaccine dose per hundred people.

stringency_index.description: The government response stringency index: composite measure based on 9 response indicators including school closures, workplace closures, and travel bans, scaled from 0 to 100 (100 = strictest response)

population_density.description: The population density of the location (people per km²).

median_age.description: The median age of the population.

aged_65_older.description: The proportion of the population that is 65 years and older.

aged_70_older.description: The proportion of the population that is 70 years and older.

gdp_per_capita.description: Gross Domestic Product per capita in US dollars.

extreme_poverty.description: The proportion of the population living in extreme poverty.

cardiovasc_death_rate.description: The death rate from cardiovascular disease in the population (per 100,000).

diabetes_prevalence.description: The prevalence of diabetes in the population (%).

female_smokers.description: The proportion of females in the population that smoke.

male_smokers.description: The proportion of males in the population that smoke.

handwashing_facilities.description: The proportion of the population with access to handwashing facilities.

hospital_beds_per_thousand.description: The number of hospital beds per 1,000 people in the population.

life_expectancy.description: The average life expectancy at birth in years.

human_development_index.description: The Human Development Index (HDI) is a summary measure of average achievement in key dimensions of human development: a long and healthy life, being knowledgeable and have a decent standard of living. The HDI is the geometric mean of normalized indices for each of the three dimensions.

excess_mortality_cumulative_absolute.description: The absolute cumulative number of excess mortality.

excess_mortality_cumulative.description: The cumulative number of excess mortality.

excess_mortality_cumulative_per_million.description: The cumulative number of excess mortality per million people.
